rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0001
rows.name:
My teacher taught me something great
the other day.

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The longer a Driver and Blade are together,
the stronger they get!

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0003
rows.name:
A Driver earns trust by fighting alongside
their Blade and completing requests.

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0004
rows.name:
In turn, when a Blade grows and gets stronger,
the Driver's spirit grows too!

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0005
rows.name:
They have a correlative relationship!
That's what he said!

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0006
rows.name:
When I become a Driver, I have to make
sure I get along with my Blade.
